description: Provides a RAM User Login Profile resource.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

MfaBindRequired.description: This parameter indicates whether the MFA needs to be bind when the user first logs in. Default value is `false`.

PasswordResetRequired.description: This parameter indicates whether the password needs to be reset when the user first logs in. Default value is `false`.

UserName.description: Name of the RAM user. This name can have a string of 1 to 64 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or hyphens, such as "-",".","_", and must not begin with a hyphen.
